Name: 2048  art
About the game: 2048art is a classic puzzle with a simple goal; reach 2048. Move your tiles across the grid and merge identical numbers into one. Plan ahead and watch out for new tiles spawning, that may prevent you from joining your numbers. In particular, users with DLC loaded. We have attached five images to the DLC and will update five more images in the five weeks after the launch. FEATURES MORE CUP Replace the original number with a different cup, now you can use two A cups to synthesize one B cup. Finally get I cup！ THE ORIGINAL MADE BETTER 2048 stays true to its roots and the core gameplay that made it such a cult classic. But players can get more attractive picture rewards during the game
